thread.title_full: Risk and Rewards of CRE-CLO and CLO Securitizations: Navigating the Capital Markets

author: Dechert LLP
title: Risk and Rewards of CRE-CLO and CLO Securitizations: Navigating the Capital Markets
text:
Embed 
To embed, copy and paste the code into your website or blog: 

More than 100 senior executives participated in Dechert â€™s Risk and Rewards of CRE-CLO and CLO Securitizations: Navigating the Capital Markets seminar. The half day event, supported by CRE Finance Council (CREFC) and the Loan Syndications and Trading Association (LSTA), focused on themes important to the CLO market and the CRE securitization market. Panelists addressed market issues, structure and structural issues as well as regulatory and tax considerations. 
Very senior and knowledgeable panelists from institutions including Wells Fargo Securities , Crescent Capital , Guggenheim Partners , KPMG , Latitude Real Estate Investors , TCW , Western Asset Management Co . as well as government relations experts from both CREFC and LSTA discussed issues ranging from structural innovation, dealing with the new and market considerations relevant to sponsoring, issuing and investing in real estate and non-real estate CLOs.
